movie.title: The Candidate
movie.description_intro: In 1980 Franz Josef Strauss competed against Helmut Schmidt for the Office of the Government of the Federal Republic of Germany. To prevent this the first Garde German auteur staged an episode film to expose the candidate - mainly by citing speeches, with whom he appeared in public in the course of his political career.
movie.description_full: In 1980 Franz Josef Strauss competed against Helmut Schmidt for the Office of the Government of the Federal Republic of Germany. To prevent this the first Garde German auteur staged an episode film to expose the candidate - mainly by citing speeches, with whom he appeared in public in the course of his political career.

movies.title: I Am Greta
movies.summary: In August of 2018, Greta Thunberg, a 15-year-old student in Sweden starts a school strike for the climate. Her question for adults: if you don't care about her future on earth, why should she care about her future in school? Within months, her strike evolves into a global movement. Greta, a quiet East-European girl on the autism spectrum is now a world famous activist. The team behind Greta has been following the young activist from her very first day of school striking.
movies.description_full: In August of 2018, Greta Thunberg, a 15-year-old student in Sweden starts a school strike for the climate. Her question for adults: if you don't care about her future on earth, why should she care about her future in school? Within months, her strike evolves into a global movement. Greta, a quiet East-European girl on the autism spectrum is now a world famous activist. The team behind Greta has been following the young activist from her very first day of school striking.

movies.title: Stolen Daughters: Kidnapped by Boko Haram
movies.title_english: Stolen Daughters: Kidnapped by Boko Haram
movies.title_long: Stolen Daughters: Kidnapped by Boko Haram (2018)
movies.summary: The story of the freed female hostages of Boko Haram, detailing their lives in captivity and since their release.
movies.description_full: The story of the freed female hostages of Boko Haram, detailing their lives in captivity and since their release.
movies.synopsis: The story of the freed female hostages of Boko Haram, detailing their lives in captivity and since their release.

movies.title: The Spy Who Went Into the Cold
movies.title_english: The Spy Who Went Into the Cold
movies.title_long: The Spy Who Went Into the Cold (2013)
movies.summary: Documentary on Kim Philby's career as an MI6 agent who spied for the Soviet Union throughout WWII and afterward, and his subsequent exile in the Moscow.
movies.description_full: Documentary on Kim Philby's career as an MI6 agent who spied for the Soviet Union throughout WWII and afterward, and his subsequent exile in the Moscow.
movies.synopsis: Documentary on Kim Philby's career as an MI6 agent who spied for the Soviet Union throughout WWII and afterward, and his subsequent exile in the Moscow.

movies.title: Hooked
movies.summary: A man from the city embarks on a journey of personal discovery as he challenges himself to determine if he has what it takes to survive as a fisherman on the Bering Sea.
movies.description_full: A man from the city embarks on a journey of personal discovery as he challenges himself to determine if he has what it takes to survive as a fisherman on the Bering Sea.
